summary: This bill, the Promoting Education on the Abraham Accords for Comprehensive Engagement Act (PEACE Act), mandates the Secretary of State to create educational programs and training for U.S. diplomatic personnel regarding the Abraham Accords and other normalization agreements with Israel. It includes provisions for course development, virtual training modules, fellowships, and the establishment of an advisory board. The bill also requires the Secretary to develop a strategy for implementing these programs and submit reports to Congress on their progress.
